verses.verse: ALEPH <S%H835><s%>. Blessed are they that are perfect <S%H8549><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, Who walk <S%H1980><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that keep <S%H5341><s%> his testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, That seek <S%H1875><s%> him with the whole heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Yea <S%H6466><s%>, they do no unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%>; They walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>.
Thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> us thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>, That we should observe <S%H8104><s%> them diligently <S%H3966><s%>.
Oh that <S%H305><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%> were established <S%H3559><s%> To observe <S%H8104><s%> thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>!
Then shall I not be put to shame <S%H954><s%>, When I have respect <S%H5027><s%> unto all thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>.
I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thee with uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%>, When I learn <S%H3925><s%> thy righteous <S%H6664><s%> judgments <S%H4941><s%>.
I will observe <S%H8104><s%> thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>: Oh forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not utterly <S%H3966><s%>.
BETH <S%H5288><s%>. Wherewith shall a young man cleanse <S%H2135><s%> his way <S%H734><s%>? By taking heed <S%H8104><s%> thereto according to thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
With my whole heart <S%H3820><s%> have I sought <S%H1875><s%> thee <S%H7686><s%>: Oh let me not wander from thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>.
Thy word <S%H565><s%> have I laid <S%H6845><s%> up in my heart <S%H3820><s%>, That I might not sin against thee <S%H2398><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> art thou <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah: Teach <S%H3925><s%> me thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
With my lips <S%H8193><s%> have I declared <S%H5608><s%> All the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
I have rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of thy testimonies <S%H5715><s%>, As much as in <S%H5921><s%> all riches <S%H1952><s%>.
I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> on thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>, And have respect <S%H5027><s%> unto thy ways <S%H734><s%>.
I will delight <S%H8173><s%> myself in thy statutes <S%H2708><s%>: I will not forget <S%H7911><s%> thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
GIMEL <S%H1580><s%>. Deal bountifully with thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, that I may live <S%H2421><s%>; So will I observe <S%H8104><s%> thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Open <S%H1540><s%> thou mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, that I may behold <S%H5027><s%> Wondrous things <S%H6381><s%> out of thy law <S%H8451><s%>.
I am a sojourner <S%H1616><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>: Hide <S%H5641><s%> not thy commandments from me <S%H4687><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> breaketh <S%H1638><s%> for the longing <S%H8375><s%> That it hath unto thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%> at all times <S%H6256><s%>.
Thou hast rebuked <S%H1605><s%> the proud <S%H2086><s%> that are cursed <S%H779><s%>, That do wander <S%H7686><s%> from thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>.
Take <S%H1556><s%> away from me reproach <S%H2781><s%> and contempt <S%H937><s%>; For I have kept <S%H5341><s%> thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%>.
Princes <S%H8269><s%> also sat <S%H3427><s%> and talked <S%H1696><s%> against me <S%H5650><s%>; But thy servant did meditate <S%H7878><s%> on thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
Thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%> also are my delight <S%H8191><s%> And my counsellors <S%H582><s%>.
DALETH <S%H5315><s%>. My soul cleaveth <S%H1692><s%> unto the dust <S%H6083><s%>: Quicken <S%H2421><s%> thou me according to thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
I declared <S%H5608><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%>, and thou answeredst <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H3925><s%>: Teach me thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
Make me to understand <S%H995><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>: So shall I meditate <S%H7878><s%> on thy wondrous works <S%H6381><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> melteth <S%H1811><s%> for heaviness <S%H8424><s%>: Strengthen <S%H6965><s%> thou me according unto thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Remove <S%H5493><s%> from me the way <S%H1870><s%> of falsehood <S%H8267><s%>; And grant me thy law <S%H8451><s%> graciously <S%H2603><s%>.
I have chosen <S%H977><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of faithfulness <S%H530><s%>: Thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%> have I set before me <S%H7737><s%>.
I cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto thy testimonies <S%H5715><s%>: O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, put me not to shame <S%H954><s%>.
I will run <S%H7323><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>, When thou shalt enlarge <S%H7337><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%>.
HE <S%H3384><s%>. Teach me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, the way <S%H1870><s%> of thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>; And I shall keep <S%H5341><s%> it unto the end <S%H6118><s%>.
Give me understanding <S%H995><s%>, and I shall keep <S%H5341><s%> thy law <S%H8451><s%>; Yea <S%H8104><s%>, I shall observe it with my whole heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Make me to go <S%H1869><s%> in the path <S%H5410><s%> of thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>; For therein do I delight <S%H2654><s%>.
Incline <S%H5186><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> unto thy testimonies <S%H5715><s%>, And not to covetousness <S%H1215><s%>.
Turn away <S%H5674><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> from beholding <S%H7200><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%>, And quicken <S%H2421><s%> me in thy ways <S%H1870><s%>.
Confirm <S%H6965><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%> thy word <S%H565><s%>, Which is in order unto the fear of thee <S%H3374><s%>.
Turn away <S%H5674><s%> my reproach <S%H2781><s%> whereof I am afraid <S%H3025><s%>; For thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%> are good <S%H2896><s%>.
Behold <S%H8373><s%>, I have longed after thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>: Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
VAV <S%H2617><s%>. Let thy lovingkindnesses also come <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, Even thy salvation <S%H8668><s%>, according to thy word <S%H565><s%>.
So shall I have <S%H1697><s%> an answer <S%H6030><s%> for him that reproacheth <S%H2778><s%> me <S%H982><s%>; For I trust in thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
And take <S%H5337><s%> not the word <S%H1697><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> utterly <S%H3966><s%> out of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>; For I have hoped <S%H3176><s%> in thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>.
So shall I observe <S%H8104><s%> thy law <S%H8451><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> For ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
And I shall walk <S%H1980><s%> at liberty <S%H7342><s%>; For I have sought <S%H1875><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
I will also speak <S%H1696><s%> of thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%> before kings <S%H4428><s%>, And shall not be put to shame <S%H954><s%>.
And I will delight <S%H8173><s%> myself in thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>, Which I have loved <S%H157><s%>.
I will lift up <S%H5375><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> also unto thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>, which I have loved <S%H157><s%>; And I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> on thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
ZAYIN <S%H2142><s%>. Remember the word <S%H1697><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, Because thou hast made me to hope <S%H3176><s%>.
This is my comfort <S%H5165><s%> in my affliction <S%H6040><s%>; For thy word <S%H565><s%> hath quickened me <S%H2421><s%>.
The proud <S%H2086><s%> have had me greatly <S%H3966><s%> in derision <S%H3887><s%>: Yet have I not swerved <S%H5186><s%> from thy law <S%H8451><s%>.
I have remembered <S%H2142><s%> thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And have comforted myself <S%H5162><s%>.
Hot indignation <S%H2152><s%> hath taken hold <S%H270><s%> upon me <S%H7563><s%>, Because of the wicked that forsake <S%H5800><s%> thy law <S%H8451><s%>.
Thy statutes <S%H2706><s%> have been my songs <S%H2158><s%> In the house <S%H1004><s%> of my pilgrimage <S%H4033><s%>.
I have remembered <S%H2142><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in the night <S%H3915><s%>, And have observed <S%H8104><s%> thy law <S%H8451><s%>.
This I have had <S%H5341><s%>, Because I have kept thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
HHETH <S%H3068><s%>. Jehovah is my portion <S%H2506><s%>: I have said <S%H559><s%> that I would observe <S%H8104><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%>.
I entreated <S%H2470><s%> thy favor <S%H6440><s%> with my whole heart <S%H3820><s%>: Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me according to thy word <S%H565><s%>.
I thought <S%H2803><s%> on my ways <S%H1870><s%>, And turned <S%H7725><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> unto thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%>.
I made haste <S%H2363><s%>, and delayed <S%H4102><s%> not <S%H8104><s%>, To observe thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>.
The cords <S%H2256><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> have wrapped <S%H5749><s%> me round <S%H7911><s%>; But I have not forgotten thy law <S%H8451><s%>.
At midnight <S%H2676><s%> I will rise <S%H6965><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thee Because of thy righteous <S%H6664><s%> ordinances <S%H4941><s%>.
I am a companion <S%H2270><s%> of all them that fear <S%H3372><s%> thee <S%H8104><s%>, And of them that observe thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
The earth <S%H776><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, is full <S%H4390><s%> of thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>: Teach <S%H3925><s%> me thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
TETH <S%H6213><s%>. Thou hast dealt well <S%H2896><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, according unto thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Teach <S%H3925><s%> me good <S%H2898><s%> judgment <S%H2940><s%> and knowledge <S%H1847><s%>; For I have believed <S%H539><s%> in thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>.
Before I was afflicted <S%H6031><s%> I went astray <S%H7683><s%>; But now I observe <S%H8104><s%> thy word <S%H565><s%>.
Thou art good <S%H2896><s%>, and doest good <S%H2895><s%>; Teach <S%H3925><s%> me thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
The proud <S%H2086><s%> have forged <S%H2950><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> against me <S%H3820><s%>: With my whole heart will I keep <S%H5341><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
Their heart <S%H3820><s%> is as fat <S%H2954><s%> as grease <S%H2459><s%>; But I delight <S%H8173><s%> in thy law <S%H8451><s%>.
It is good <S%H2896><s%> for me that I have been afflicted <S%H6031><s%>; That I may learn <S%H3925><s%> thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
The law <S%H8451><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> unto me Than thousands <S%H505><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%>.
YODH <S%H3027><s%>. Thy hands have made <S%H6213><s%> me and fashioned <S%H6213><s%> me <S%H995><s%>: Give me understanding, that I may learn <S%H3925><s%> thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>.
They that fear <S%H3373><s%> thee shall see <S%H7200><s%> me and be glad <S%H8055><s%>, Because I have hoped <S%H3176><s%> in thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
I know <S%H3045><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> are righteous <S%H6664><s%>, And that in faithfulness <S%H530><s%> thou hast afflicted me <S%H6031><s%>.
Let <S%H2617><s%>, I pray thee, thy lovingkindness be for my comfort <S%H5162><s%>, According to thy word <S%H565><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>.
Let thy tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> come <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H2421><s%>, that I may live; For thy law <S%H8451><s%> is my delight <S%H8191><s%>.
Let the proud <S%H2086><s%> be put to shame <S%H954><s%>; For they have overthrown <S%H5791><s%> me wrongfully <S%H8267><s%>: But I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> on thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
Let those that fear <S%H3373><s%> thee turn <S%H7725><s%> unto me <S%H3045><s%>; And they shall know thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%>.
Let my heart <S%H3820><s%> be perfect <S%H8549><s%> in thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>, That I be not put to shame <S%H954><s%>.
KAPH <S%H5315><s%>. My soul fainteth <S%H3615><s%> for thy salvation <S%H8668><s%>; But I hope <S%H3176><s%> in thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> fail <S%H3615><s%> for thy word <S%H565><s%>, While I say <S%H559><s%>, When wilt thou comfort me <S%H5162><s%>?
For I am become like a wine-skin <S%H4997><s%> in the smoke <S%H7008><s%>; Yet do I not forget <S%H7911><s%> thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
How many are the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>? When wilt thou execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> on them that persecute me <S%H7291><s%>?
The proud <S%H2086><s%> have digged <S%H3738><s%> pits <S%H7882><s%> for me <S%H8451><s%>, Who are not according to thy law.
All thy commandments <S%H4687><s%> are faithful <S%H530><s%>: They persecute <S%H7291><s%> me wrongfully <S%H8267><s%>; Help thou me <S%H5826><s%>.
They had almost <S%H4592><s%> consumed <S%H3615><s%> me upon earth <S%H776><s%>; But I forsook <S%H5800><s%> not thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me after thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>; So shall I observe <S%H8104><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
LAMEDH <S%H5769><s%>. For ever, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Thy word <S%H1697><s%> is settled <S%H5324><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
Thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> is unto all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>: Thou hast established <S%H3559><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and it abideth <S%H5975><s%>.
They abide <S%H5975><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> according to thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>; For all things are thy servants <S%H5650><s%>.
Unless <S%H3884><s%> thy law <S%H8451><s%> had been my delight <S%H8191><s%>, I should then have perished <S%H6><s%> in mine affliction <S%H6040><s%>.
I will never <S%H5769><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>; For with them thou hast quickened me <S%H2421><s%>.
I am thine <S%H3467><s%>, save me <S%H1875><s%>; For I have sought thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> have waited <S%H6960><s%> for me <S%H6><s%>, to destroy me <S%H995><s%>; But I will consider thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%>.
I have seen <S%H7200><s%> an end <S%H7093><s%> of all perfection <S%H8502><s%>; But thy commandment <S%H4687><s%> is exceeding <S%H3966><s%> broad <S%H7342><s%>.
MEM <S%H157><s%>. Oh how love I thy law <S%H8451><s%>! It is my meditation <S%H7881><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>.
Thy commandments <S%H4687><s%> make me wiser <S%H2449><s%> than mine enemies <S%H341><s%>; For they are ever with me <S%H5769><s%>.
I have more understanding <S%H7919><s%> than all my teachers <S%H3925><s%>; For thy testimonies <S%H5715><s%> are my meditation <S%H7881><s%>.
I understand <S%H995><s%> more than the aged <S%H2205><s%>, Because I have kept <S%H5341><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
I have refrained <S%H3607><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> from every evil <S%H7451><s%> way <S%H734><s%>, That I might observe <S%H8104><s%> thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
I have not turned <S%H5493><s%> aside from thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>; For thou hast taught me <S%H3384><s%>.
How sweet <S%H4452><s%> are thy words <S%H565><s%> unto my taste <S%H2441><s%>! Yea <S%H1706><s%>, sweeter than honey to my mouth <S%H6310><s%>!
Through thy precepts <S%H6490><s%> I get understanding <S%H995><s%>: Therefore I hate <S%H8130><s%> every false <S%H8267><s%> way <S%H734><s%>.
NUN <S%H1697><s%>. Thy word is a lamp <S%H5216><s%> unto my feet <S%H7272><s%>, And light <S%H216><s%> unto my path <S%H5410><s%>.
I have sworn <S%H7650><s%>, and have confirmed <S%H6965><s%> it <S%H8104><s%>, That I will observe thy righteous <S%H6664><s%> ordinances <S%H4941><s%>.
I am afflicted <S%H6031><s%> very much <S%H3966><s%>: Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, according unto thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Accept <S%H7521><s%>, I beseech thee <S%H5071><s%>, the freewill-offerings of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And teach <S%H3925><s%> me thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> is continually <S%H8548><s%> in my hand <S%H3709><s%>; Yet do I not forget <S%H7911><s%> thy law <S%H8451><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> have laid <S%H5414><s%> a snare <S%H6341><s%> for me <S%H8582><s%>; Yet have I not gone astray from thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
Thy testimonies <S%H5715><s%> have I taken as a heritage <S%H5157><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; For they are the rejoicing <S%H8342><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%>.
I have inclined <S%H5186><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to perform <S%H6213><s%> thy statutes <S%H2706><s%> For ever <S%H6118><s%>, even unto the end.
SAMEKH <S%H8130><s%>. I hate them that are of a double mind <S%H5588><s%>; But thy law <S%H8451><s%> do I love <S%H157><s%>.
Thou art my hiding-place <S%H5643><s%> and my shield <S%H4043><s%>: I hope <S%H3176><s%> in thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from me <S%H7489><s%>, ye evil-doers, That I may keep <S%H5341><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of my God <S%H430><s%>.
Uphold <S%H5564><s%> me according unto thy word <S%H565><s%>, that I may live <S%H2421><s%>; And let me not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of my hope <S%H7664><s%>.
Hold thou me up <S%H5582><s%>, and I shall be safe <S%H3467><s%>, And shall have respect <S%H8159><s%> unto thy statutes <S%H2706><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.
Thou hast set at nought <S%H5541><s%> all them that err <S%H7686><s%> from thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>; For their deceit <S%H8649><s%> is falsehood <S%H8267><s%>.
Thou puttest away <S%H7673><s%> all the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> like dross <S%H5509><s%>: Therefore I love <S%H157><s%> thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%>.
My flesh <S%H1320><s%> trembleth <S%H5568><s%> for fear <S%H6343><s%> of thee <S%H3372><s%>; And I am afraid of thy judgments <S%H4941><s%>.
AYIN <S%H6213><s%>. I have done justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: Leave <S%H3240><s%> me not to mine oppressors <S%H6231><s%>.
Be surety <S%H6148><s%> for thy servant <S%H5650><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>: Let not the proud <S%H2086><s%> oppress me <S%H6231><s%>.
